title: Gas Guzzlers Extreme by relentlesstech
description:
Gas Guzzlers Extreme by relentlesstech

Gas Guzzlers Extreme is fast, furious and armed to the teeth: lead-foot-trigger-happy shooter shifted into the 5th gear! ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a fast-paced addictive combat racing game that features many different vehicles, weapons, upgrades, on-track bonuses as well as distinctive environments. 
Players starts with low performance vehicles and gradually works his way up by earning money in a series of challenging races.


Categories, tracks and vehicles are unlocked as player progresses throughout the game.  
Along with developing his driving and fighting skills, player has to invest his hard earned money wisely to grab the chance for driving on the road to glory.

Key Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Single player campaign divided in 3 tiers, featuring 6 different game modes in total.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fast as lightning tournament based multiplayer Ã¢â‚¬â€œ includes 6 different multiplayer modes along with additional 7 modes for team based multiplayer; up to 4 teams available in team play mode.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Instant play -AI Bots for multiplayer available you donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have to wait for other players to join in anymore.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Run your own server in seconds Ã¢â‚¬â€œ dedicated server launcher shipped within the game.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Garage mode - Packed with over 18 fully customizable and destructible vehicles. Customize your vehicle with fancy rims, fat tires and add some dazzling custom painted designs. Pimp your ride with style!

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Realistic and astonishing race tracks - More than 350 miles of battle ground set up in 50+ tracks/ arenas divided in 7 different settings.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fast Money - Earn top dollar for every victim that you make wipeout or kill in the arena. Through Gas Guzzlers Extreme money economy system: be sure to Ã¢â‚¬Å“Earn Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Upgrade Ã¢â‚¬â€œ DominateÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ your opponents!

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Combat racing at its best, combines both worlds of combat racing, death match meets classic racing style, best car combat experience ever.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Next generation graphic features and visuals.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Full force feedback controller support for better gaming experience- keyboards, joy pads, joysticks and racing wheels at your disposal.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Full integration with Steam Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Achievements, Leaderboards, Trading cards, Steam cloud, etc...
